description: This file defines a Qwik component for a Next Steps guide in a tutorial interface. It includes a list of instructional messages, manages user interactions via signals and window events, and renders UI elements such as headings, hints, and navigation buttons.

methods.name: component$
methods.description: Defines a Qwik component that manages the tutorial steps, user interactions, and rendering logic.
Wraps event handler functions for Qwik's reactive optimizations.
